abstract: When it comes to netbooks, at least some companies appear to be making money — like the Taiwanese manufacturers of their inexpensive displays.
snippet: When it comes to netbooks, at least some companies appear to be making money — like the Taiwanese manufacturers of their inexpensive displays.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:17 p.m. Clarified that iSuppli’s revenue figures refer specifically to displays

headline.main: Behind the Scenes of the Netbook Boom
